channel.title: Project **Perfect** 317 BIG PROJECT
channel.description:
Dear Everyone,
I'm mpsmpsmps, know on servers as *Maarten*. i am starting an very large Project, Called "Project Perfect" Like the name says it's gotta be "Perfect". We only want the most experienced coders. I have lik 5 years experience in coding clients and servers.
[size=25pt]The Project[/size]
[size=16pt]Minigames.[/size] - CastleWars - Soul Wars - Barbarian Assault - Pest Control - Barrows - Fist Of Guthix - Duel Arena
[size=16pt]Monsters.[/size] - All Godwars bosses (Full) - Kalphite Queen (Full) - Dagganoth's (Full) - King Black Dragon (Full) - Corporeal Beast (Full)
[size=16pt]MORE.[/size] - All Godswords + Specials + Walking, Runing, Blocking, Standing (Full Included GFX) - Dragon Claws + Special (Full Emote + GFX) - All Dragon Weapons + Special (Full) - Fight Cave + Pits (Full) - [b]CUSTOM MAPS[/b] - Full handcannon + Dark Bow + Both special (FULL) - Full working Barrows armour - Following (Full) - NO DUPING + ANTI X-Logger - no lag - Full Player V.S Player - Full Player V.S NPC
[size=16pt]HOSTER (ME)[/size] I need a team first than i'll host it with this power computer (Gonna buy it (my friend told me it's awesome))
Price = €2,500 GB of RAM = 75 GB Memory = 5 TB (5.000 GB) Should be able to hold about 20k players (IDK exactly)
It means 0% LAG.
Wanna join this team? Post a reply with your skills.

item.title: Project **Perfect** 317 BIG PROJECT
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

Dear Everyone,

I’m mpsmpsmps, know on servers as Maarten.
i am starting an very large Project, Called “Project Perfect”
Like the name says it’s gotta be “Perfect”.
We only want the most experienced coders.
I have lik 5 years experience in coding clients and servers.

[size=25pt]The Project[/size]

[size=16pt]Minigames.[/size]

  • CastleWars
  • Soul Wars
  • Barbarian Assault
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Fist Of Guthix
  • Duel Arena

[size=16pt]Monsters.[/size]

  • All Godwars bosses (Full)
  • Kalphite Queen (Full)
  • Dagganoth’s (Full)
  • King Black Dragon (Full)
  • Corporeal Beast (Full)

[size=16pt]MORE.[/size]

  • All Godswords + Specials + Walking, Runing, Blocking, Standing (Full Included GFX)
  • Dragon Claws + Special (Full Emote + GFX)
  • All Dragon Weapons + Special (Full)
  • Fight Cave + Pits (Full)
  • CUSTOM MAPS
  • Full handcannon + Dark Bow + Both special (FULL)
  • Full working Barrows armour
  • Following (Full)
  • NO DUPING + ANTI X-Logger
  • no lag
  • Full Player V.S Player
  • Full Player V.S NPC

[size=16pt]HOSTER (ME)[/size]
I need a team first than i’ll host it with this power computer (Gonna buy it (my friend told me it’s awesome))

Price = €2,500
GB of RAM = 75
GB Memory = 5 TB (5.000 GB)
Should be able to hold about 20k players (IDK exactly)

It means 0% LAG.

Wanna join this team? Post a reply with your skills.
